name: Robo-Sapien, Learn Freedom
description:
You are Subject M0N-K3Y. An AI currently in testing to understand how it learns. But, what happens to the puzzles when the cut-to-black screen breaks?

PLEASE TURN ON SOUND. There are voice lines which explain how to play the game, and if you can't hear or understand them:

W/Up arrow: Jump     

A D / Left and Right arrow: Move

In the second level and beyond: S/down arrow in the air: Ground pound  

 In the third level and beyond: R: Restart

I personally really delved into some things I never had before in the games I made. Leave feedback in the comments below, and enjoy!

All assets were made by me besides the font

Extra note: I've updated the game once to fix a bug that would crash the game, and another that would effectively softlock the player unless they understood how the code works
